channel.title: A Comand For 2 People Help

item.title: A Comand For 2 People Help
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Your error lies within your logical operator

if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("D X R") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("hi)) {

What this is saying in English is:

if the command that the interacting character has inputted starts with the prefix “update” and their characters name equals “D X R” and their character name ALSO equals “Hi”.

You cannot have two character names.

if (command.equals("update") && name.equals("name1") || name.equals("name2")) {

Something along the lines of this snippet would work.

What is says is:
if the command that the interacting character has inputted equals the prefix “update” and their characters name equals “name1” OR their character name “name2” else, you cannot use the command.

Make sense?

Read full topic
